<schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://www.artsoft.com/stats" version="0.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:art="http://www.artsoft.com/stats"> <simpleType name="nonEmptyString"> <restriction base="string"> <minLength value="1"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="positiveInt"> <restriction base="int"> <minExclusive value="0"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="resolutionType"> <annotation> <documentation>Graphics display resolution of used screen.</documentation> </annotation> <all> <element name="width" type="art:positiveInt"/> <element name="height" type="art:positiveInt"/> </all> </complexType> <element name="statistic"> <complexType> <annotation> <documentation>Statistic data of ArtSoft application.</documentation> </annotation> <all> <element name="name" type="art:nonEmptyString"/> <element name="value" type="art:nonEmptyString"/> <element name="resolution" type="art:resolutionType"/> </all> </complexType> </element> </schema>

con:testCase.name: TestCase 1

con:config.script:
import java.util.Random
log.debug "Generating random height and width values."
int max = 999 Random rand = new Random()
String height = rand.nextInt(max) + 1 testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "stat_height", "$height" )
String width = rand.nextInt(max) + 1 testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue( "stat_width", "$width" )
log.debug "Generated: height = '$height', width = '$width'."
